images.question: Does it look like the laser beam is affecting the sky in some way?
images.description: An observatory under a starry sky emits a laser beam into the Milky Way galaxy.

images.question: what is the occasion?
images.description: A performer sings into a microphone, wearing a yellow outfit with circular patterns, against a blurred background. She has long curly amber hair and light brown skin.

images.question: What color is the balloon
images.description: A hot air balloon flies over a verdant landscape dotted with ancient temples at sunrise.
